alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 7:13AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect Geauga...northeastern Cuyahoga and southwestern Lake Counties Until 830 AM EST.... At 711 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Lorain to near Cleveland to 6 miles south of Burton. This band will wobble across area with individual bursts of snow moving east at 20 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Chardon, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Solon, Willoughby, Warrensville Heights, South Russell, Middlefield, Burton, Highland Hills, Chesterland, Shaker Heights, South Euclid, Mayfield Heights, East Cleveland, Lyndhurst, University Heights, Wickliffe and Beachwood. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 311, 312, 313, 319, 320, and 329.
